title: My Google pixcle 3xl fall down and broken dispaly glass. How can I changed it. I'am from Meerut up .
content:
My Google pixel 3xl fall down and broken display glass. Display and touch working properly. How can I changed my display galss. 
In local market there are no parts available of Google, and cost is also vey high. So please suggest the authorise service center. Where I can repair my phone. Or other way to fix it is I am from Meerut(UP) india .
